name: Mello Ball
description:
While the famous Magic 8 ball answers questions, the Mello Ball is an almost sentient anti-stress geodesic created to be an anti-anxiety oracle. Touching the mouth generates 1 of 16 carefully researched calming phrases. Touching the colored globes generates over 16,000 unique and soothing ambient sound tracks. Vocal Credits: Ryan Moite Music Credits: InBflat

Jnoodle Games are makers of unique educational games that students will want to play again and again.
